definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Is 33:21 ship (loan-word from Egypt.t’aī, acc. to Bondi:66, cf. Erman:ZMG xivi (1892),123 DHM:VOJ viii. 7, 165);—abs. [[חִי אַדִּיר]] Is 33:21 a majestic ship; pl. [[חִים]] Nu 24:24 (JE), Ez Eze 30:9 (´[[בַּצּ]]; but LXX speu/dontev, cf. SyrVer, whence Co Berthol [[אָחִים]]).
